title: New Bail Out
body: There should be a system that allows a bail out of a game for when there are trolls in a game. For instance, I was playing a ranked match and people chose other peoples champs to sabotage. You dodge, you lose. You play, you prob lose. Bad for mojo. The addition of an afk early game was nice. Perhaps one later game too.

replies.body:
You'll have a better audience here:
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation
I believe that "IaintgotSTDs" has a point. I think a voting mechanic added to the pre-game lobby to kick a player would be a healthy addition to the game.

Would need to find the best way to prevent groups from abusing it.
Either only let the group leader vote, or have the entire group's vote only count as one (majority of group's vote is the chosen one, is intra-group vote is equal yes/no, count it as no vote).

while i agree this should ideally be implemented it can be too easily abused..
 however i do think if u dodge you should be able to report the teammates u had in the lobby

What about the suggestion I had above? ^^^

I think it would be good.
